{{Location Intro|description=Its waters serve as an information system and the central part is called "Hauteclaire." It is also made up of various subterranean caverns and water veins, with many connecting to the [[Weeping Willow of the Lake]].}}

The [[Local Legend]] {{Enemy|Hat Jellyfish|text=Mageblade Corrouge — With the Purewater Tide It Came}} can be found here after completing the {{Quest|The Wild Fairy of Erinnyes}}.

==Trivia==
* Hauteclaire is a legendary sword belonging to {{w|Oliver (paladin)|Oliver}}, a knight in the {{w|Matter of France}}.
* In Genshin, the Hauteclaire, also known as the [[Splendor of Tranquil Waters]], was also used by [[Erinnyes (NPC)|Erinnyes]] and tossed into a lake.
